| HistoryText             = The Jotunheim Strikeforce was a team of heroes assembled by [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] during the [[War of the Realms]] to rescue [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]], who had been left stranded in [[Jotunheim]] by [[Malekith (Earth-616)|Malekith]], on behalf of [[Freyja Freyrdottir (Earth-616)|Freyja]].{{r|War of the Realms Vol 1 3}}

The heroes reached Jotunheim using the newly-reactivated [[Bifrost]], but their flying steeds save for [[Arctorius (Earth-616)|Arctorius]] were all killed by Frost Giant archers. They continued on foot, following a trail of Frost Giant blood to Thor, who had become submerged in warrior's madness. The Strikeforce fought the near-endless swarm of Frost Giants alongside Thor for hours, costing Arctorius' life, until the monsters were all defeated, causing Thor to snap out of his rage. Afterwards, they returned to [[Earth|Midgard]].{{r|War of the Realms Strikeforce: The Land of Giants Vol 1 1}}
